titles.title: JP608 We Want To See Jesus Lifted High

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v1 v4 v3 v1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We want to see Jesus lifted high,
A banner that flies across this land,
That all men might see the truth and know
He is the way to heaven.
We want to see Jesus lifted high,
A banner that flies across this land,
That all men might see the truth and know
He is the way to heaven.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We want to see, We want to see,
We want to see Jesus lifted high.
We want to see, we want to see,
We want to see Jesus lifted high.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Step by step we're moving forward,
Little by little taking ground,
Every prayer a powerful weapon,
Strongholds come tumbling down,
And down, and down, and down.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We're gonna see, we're gonna see,
We're gonna see Jesus lifted high.
We're gonna see, we're gonna see,
We're gonna see Jesus lifted high.
